title: Chapter 1381 - A Test Of Strength!
body:
Chapter 1381 - A Test Of Strength!

Hong Feiyu faced Su Yi and bowed elegantly. When everyone saw this, they couldn’t help but sigh to themselves.

In the modern era, perhaps only Su Yi, the man who controlled the power of reincarnation, could receive such a show of respect from the Hong Family’s Little Demon God.

Su Yi took a sip of wine. “You’re here to make trouble, so why feign politeness?”

“Trouble?” Hong Feiyu laughed. “When I left, my seniors commanded me to be polite and not to cause an incident. Please don’t misunderstand, Fellow Daoist.”

He waved his jade fan, and the thin, white-haired old man accompanying him immediately took out a bronze box, which he opened for all to see.

Treasure light surged out of its interior, so dazzling that it stung the eyes. Its colors reflected on the nearby skies, making them light up.

The crowd couldn’t help but be curious. All of them looked over. Inside the box, they saw a pile of wondrous and precious treasures. All of them flowed with colorful light, and all were rare and precious. It was obvious at a glance that none were ordinary!

Hong Feiyu chuckled and said, “This is our first meeting, Fellow Daoist...
